data.text: If you are threatened by my and others' righteous anger, then perhaps you need to practice some self reflection before you show up on my timeline trying to tell me and others like me how to act.

My silence has enabled the racists and misogynists in my life to believe that their behavior is okay. 

I will not be complicit in their violence. We have coddled these people with niceties they didn't deserve for too long and look where it got us.

VOTING. DOES. NOT. SOLVE. EVERYTHING. 

Say it with me. 

When the voices - the votes - of the strongest part of the Democratic base are being LITERALLY SUPPRESSED without real opposition, we have to acknowledge that *sometimes* voting alone is not 👏🏼 enough 👏🏼
